content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/numba/numba.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use an official Python runtime as the base image
FROM python:3.10

# Set the working directory in the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repo into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install conda for dependency management
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y wget && \
    wget https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh && \
    bash Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh -b -p /opt/conda && \
    rm Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh

# Add conda to PATH
ENV PATH=/opt/conda/bin:$PATH

# Create and activate the conda environment with required dependencies
RUN conda create -n numbaenv python=3.10 numba/label/dev::llvmlite numpy scipy jinja2 cffi && \
    conda clean -afy

# Set up the environment to ensure it's activated during build
SHELL [

vm_control.OutOfStorage: 
Traceback (most recent call last):

  File "/home/coinse/Documents/lm/spring2024/doctest/vm_control.py", line 301, in test_dockerfile
